text: Afërdita Tusha (4 September 1945 – 23 September 2018) was an Albanian female sports shooter who competed at the 1972 Summer Olympic Games against the men in the 50 metre free pistol, she finished 51st. She was the first woman to represent Albania at the Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Albanian female sport shooters Category:Shooters at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic shooters of Albania Category:Place of birth missing
title: Afërdita Tusha
